snippet: A weary Floyd Mayweather Jr. retained his W.B.A. and W.B.C. welterweight titles Saturday night, then fielded questions about a possible bout against Manny Pacquiao.
abstract: Floyd Mayweather Jr retains his WBA and WBC welterweight titles after 12-round fight with Marcos Maidana; Mayweather claims Maidana bit him during bout; fields questions about possible match against Manny Pacquiao.
lead_paragraph: A weary Floyd Mayweather Jr. retained his W.B.A. and W.B.C. welterweight titles Saturday night, then fielded questions about a possible bout against Manny Pacquiao.

headline.seo: Floyd Mayweather Jr., Asked About a Possible Manny Pacquiao Bout, Remains Defiant
headline.main: No Answers After Win, Only More Questions
headline.print_headline: No Answers After Win, Only More Questions
